text: Hi, I’m Francis, the host of this show Walking with Dog.
As you know, I moved to heaven last November
but I can still narrate Chef's video through my apron and T-shirt.
You might want to see Chef more frequently
but she is busy even if our video is published once a month.
She enjoys taking a cooking class and learning yoseue,
which is a type of Japanese traditional gardening technique.
Chef is doing well and I thank you guys for writing
warm and kind messages to her after I was gone.
By the way, do you know when Cooking with Dog started?
The first video is How to make Sukiyaki published on Sep 9th, 2007.
Can you believe that? It’s been 10 years since then.
If you were 12 years old girl or boy,
now you are 22, a fully mature grown-up lady … or gentleman.
When I was thinking about this, I almost got tears with happiness.
I really appreciate your continuous support.
Now I would like to give away Francis T-shirts
to celebrate our 10th anniversary
so I ask my friend to wear the t-shirt and take me outside.
This lady is Ai from Ai's munches.
You wanna tell the viewers how we met together?
Hello everybody. This is Ai from ai's munchies.
The first time I met Francis was about 2 years ago
and ever since then,
we meet up sometimes and enjoy basically yummy food.
I was alive 2 years ago.
Anyway how do they participate in the giveaway?
OK, so if you can click this right-up button above here
or the end card of this video,
that’s gonna lead you to the application form.
All you need to do is just write down your email address
and answer this this question.
And send it out. isn't it easy?
It’s a piece of fish cake. Even a dog can do that.
What is the question?
OK. The question will be
“How many times is Francis blinking during this video?”
Oh my dog!
Mind you, he might be blinking after this conversation
so you have to watch out carefully.
I have dry eye symptoms.
By the way, the t-shirt you will receive… That won’t speak.
If that speaks, who you gonna call? Francis.
Ghostbusters!
OK … that's sounds great.
Anyway, looking forward to your entries!
Is this still rolling? Hey you wanna grab some snack?
Oh sounds great!
I heard the popular melonpan shop is just round the corner.
Great. You can eat as many melonpan as you want.
It’s on me.
Really? Do you have money!?
No ...
Aww
